statements: SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_limits FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE coverage_limits > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, terms_and_conditions FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE policy_holder LIKE 'Alice%';
SELECT coverage_limits, terms_and_conditions FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE terms_and_conditions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_limits FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE coverage_limits > 1000 ORDER BY coverage_limits DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, terms_and_conditions FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE policy_holder LIKE 'John%';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limits FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE terms_and_conditions LIKE '%important%';
SELECT policy_id, terms_and_conditions, policy_holder FROM liability_insurance_policies WHERE coverage_limits < 5000 ORDER BY coverage_limits ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_limits FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, coverage_limits FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_holder = 'Alice';
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_limits, terms_conditions FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY coverage_limits DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_limits FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY coverage_limits DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_id = 3 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT policy_holder, terms_conditions FROM insurance_policies WHERE terms_conditions LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, coverage_limit FROM liability_insurance_policies;
SELECT holder_name, holder_email FROM policy_holders WHERE holder_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT company_name, company_phone_number FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM policy_holders ORDER BY holder_name DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_limit FROM liability_insurance_policies;
SELECT * FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_name = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT holder_name, holder_email, holder_phone_number FROM policy_holders WHERE holder_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab';
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM insurance_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT holder_name FROM policy_holders WHERE holder_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM policy_holders;
SELECT name, email FROM policy_holders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM insurance_companies ORDER BY year_founded DESC;
SELECT id, hq_location FROM insurance_companies WHERE name LIKE '%insurance%';
SELECT * FROM policy_details WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_holders JOIN policy_details ON policy_holders.id = policy_details.policy_id WHERE policy_holders.name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_holders.name, insurance_companies.name FROM policy_holders INNER JOIN insurance_companies ON policy_holders.id = insurance_companies.id WHERE insurance_companies.year_founded > 1990;
SELECT policy_holders.name, policy_details.coverage_limit FROM policy_holders LEFT JOIN policy_details ON policy_holders.id = policy_details.policy_id;

SELECT insurance_companies.name, policy_details.coverage_limit FROM insurance_companies RIGHT JOIN policy_details ON insurance_companies.id = policy_details.policy_id WHERE policy_details.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_holders.name, policy_conditions.condition_description FROM policy_holders INNER JOIN policy_conditions ON policy_holders.id = policy_conditions.policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, coverage_limit FROM PolicyDetails;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address, phone_number FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM Claims;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_name, premium_rate FROM CoverageTypes;
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails;
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_limit FROM PolicyDetails WHERE coverage_limit > 5000 ORDER BY policy_holder DESC;
SELECT p.policy_holder, c.claim_amount FROM PolicyDetails p JOIN Claims c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT ph.holder_name, ph.holder_address, c.claim_date FROM PolicyHolders ph JOIN Claims c ON ph.holder_id = c.policy_id ORDER BY c.claim_date ASC;
SELECT pc.policy_id, ct.coverage_name, ct.premium_rate FROM PolicyCoverage pc JOIN CoverageTypes ct ON pc.coverage_id = ct.coverage_id ORDER BY pc.policy_id ASC, ct.premium_rate DESC;
